commands.about:
Mae Tickets yn fot hawdd i'w ddefnyddio ac yn hawdd ei addasu ar gyfer cymorth. 
Gweinydd cymorth: https://discord.gg/ticketsbot
Gorchmynion: Teipiwch '/help'
Cychwynna drwy redeg '/setup'
commands.add.no_members: Mae'n rhaid i ti enwi aelodau i'w ychwanegu at y tocyn
commands.add.no_permission: Does gennyt ti ddim caniatâd i ychwanegu pobl at y tocyn
commands.addadmin.no_members: Mae'n rhaid i ti enwi defnyddiwr neu rôl i rhoi caniatâd gweinyddwr iddyn nhw
commands.addadmin.owner: Mae perchennog y gweinydd yn weinyddwr yn barod
commands.addsupport.no_members: Mae'n rhaid i ti enwi defnyddiwr neu rôl i roi breintiau cynrychiolydd cymorth iddyn nhw
commands.blacklist.no_members: Mae'n rhaid i ti enwi defnyddiwr i newid statws y rhestr ddu ar ei cyfer
commands.blacklist.self: Alli di ddim rhoi dy hun ar y rhestr ddu
commands.claim.success: Bydd dy docyn yn cael ei drin gan %s
commands.language.invalid: Mae'n rhaid i ti nodi côd iaith neu faner. Ieithoedd sydd ar gael:\n%s
commands.open.ticket_limit: Dim ond %d%s wyt ti'n gallu ei hagor ar unwaith
commands.open.too_many_tickets:
Mae gormod o docynnau yn y categori tocynnau. Gofynnwch i weinyddwr gau rhai, symud nhw i gategori arall, neu sefydlu categori drosflwyddiad.

Mae hyn yn **gyfyngiad wedi'i osod gan Discord** o 50 sianel yn y categori.
commands.premium:
Gallwch brynu tanysgrifiad premiwm o <https://www.patreon.com/ticketsbot-cloud>.
Premiwm yn cynnig llawer o fanteision, fel:
```diff
+ Creu paneli tocyn di-gyfyng
+ Addasu enw’r bot, ei lun proffil a’i statws (whitelabel)
+ Ystadegau manwl am y gweinydd, defnyddwyr a staff cymorth
+ Dim brandio yn y troedyn negeseuon
+ Cefnogi datblygiad a helpu talu costau’r gweinydd
```

Fel arall, gallwch bleidleisio yn <https://vote.tickets.bot> i gael premiwm am ddim am 24 awr
commands.premium.invalid_key: Allwedd anghywir. Sicrhewch eich bod wedi'i gopio'n gywir.

commands.tags.create.already_exists: Mae tag gyda'r ID `%s` yn bodoli yn farod. Gallwch ddileu'r tag gan ddefnyddio `/tag delete %s`

commands.vote:
Cliciwch y botwm isod i bleidleisio dros y bot a chael 24 awr o bremiwm am ddim.

Unwaith i ti bleidleisio, rheda'r gorchymyn %s eto i hawlio dy gredydau pleidleisio.

help.claim: Yn neilltuo un aelod o staff i docyn

help.invite: Yn darparu dolen wahoddiad ar gyfer y bot
help.managetags: Yn ychwanegu, dileu neu restru tagiau
help.panel: Yn creu panel i alluogi defnyddwyr i agor tocyn gyda un clic

help.removeadmin: Revokes a user's or role's admin privileges
help.removesupport: Revokes a user's or role's support representative privileges
help.setup: Allows you to easily configure the bot
help.stats: Shows you statistics about users, support staff and the server
help.statsserver: Shows you statistics about the server
help.transfer: Transfers a claimed ticket to another user
help.unclaim: Removes the claim on the current ticket
help.viewstaff: Lists the staff members and roles
help.vote: Gives you a link to vote for free premium
help.check_perms: Check if the Bot has the right Permissions
open.outside_support_hours: This panel is currently closed. Please try again during our support hours.
setup.auto.category.failure: I am missing the `Manage Channels` permission
setup.auto.completed: Setup complete! Click [here](https://dashboard.tickets.bot/manage/%d/panels) to setup a reaction panel, and add the <@&%d> and <@&%d> roles to your staff members
setup.auto.roles.failure: I am missing the `Manage Roles` permission
setup.auto.transcript.failure: I am missing the `Manage Channels` permission
setup.ticket_limit.success: The ticket limit has been updated to `%d`
setup.transcript.invalid: You must mention a valid channel in the server (e.g. <#%d>)\n**Example:** `/setup transcripts #logs`
setup.transcript.success: The transcripts channel has been changed to <#%d>
commands.language.help_wanted: Do you speak another language? Join our [support server](https://discord.gg/ticketsbot) if you're interested in helping translating the bot into more languages
commands.rename.too_long: Channel names cannot be longer than 100 characters
commands.autoclose.configure: Visit the [dashboard](https://dashboard.tickets.bot/manage/%d/settings) to change autoclose settings
help.autoclose.exclude: Excludes the current ticket from being automatically closed
commands.autoclose.exclude.success: This ticket has been excluded from being automatically closed
commands.claim.no_permission: Only staff members can claim tickets
commands.open.from:
This ticket was opened from [this message](%s).

```%s```

help.close_request: Sends a message asking the user to confirm the ticket is able to be closed
close.reason_too_long: The reason cannot be longer than 255 characters
commands.close_request.no_reason:

Please accept or deny using the buttons below.

button.guild_only: This button must be used in a server
button.dms_only: This button must be used in direct messages
commands.tags.create.success: Tag created - you can use it by running `/tag %s`
generic.error.blacklisted: You are blacklisted in this server
close.confirmation: Please confirm that you want to close this ticket
commands.premium.success: Premium has been activated for **%d** days
open.ratelimited: Tickets are being opened too quickly in this server
commands.claim.thread: Due to Discord limitations, claiming does not support threads
commands.open.guild_channel_limit: This server has reached Discord's limit of 500 channels
close.no_permission: You are not permitted to close this ticket

reason.placeholder: Reason for closing the ticket, e.g. "Resolved"

not_allowed.staff: You cannot rate this ticket because you are a support representative in %s
not_allowed.empty: You cannot rate this ticket because you did not send any messages

open.disabled: The `/open` command is disabled in this server: please use a ticket panel to open a ticket

threads.cant_see_parent_channel: Couldn't add <@%d> to the ticket: Ensure that they have permission to view the thread's parent channel (<#%d>)
threads.cant_message_in_threads: You are missing the `Send Messages in Threads` permission, which is required to open a ticket. Please ask a server administrator to grant this permission to you, and try again.

switch_panel.invalid_panel: Invalid panel: You must select one from the dropdown
switch_panel.success: This ticket has been switched to the `%s` panel by <@%d>

add_role.limit: You have reached the role blacklist limit (%d)

add.limit: You have reached the user blacklist limit (%d): consider using a role instead

jump_to_top.no_welcome_message: This ticket does not have a welcome message
jump_to_top.content: Click the button below to jump to the top of the ticket

addsupport.confirm: Please confirm that you want to add %s to the default support representative team
addsupport.everyone: You cannot add the `@everyone` role as staff

addadmin.confirm: Please confirm that you want to add %s as a bot administrator

create.limit: You have reached the tag limit (%d)

get.requires_premium: Premium is required to use custom commands (tag aliases)

language.content:
The available languages and their translation progress are as follows:

language.success: The server language has been changed to **%s** (%s)

on_call.channel_mode: `/on-call` can only be used in thread mode. Visit our [docs](https://docs.tickets.bot/features/thread-mode) to find out more about threads
on_call.remove_success: You are no longer on call

reopen.no_permission: You do not have permission to reopen this ticket
reopen.thread_deleted: The ticket has been permanently deleted
reopen.in_ticket: This ticket has been reopened by <@%d>

premium.subscription_found_content: In order to apply your subscription to this server, the server owner (<@%d>) must add you as an admin **user** (roles are ignored) via the </addadmin:%d> command.\n\nYou can verify that you have been added as an admin user by running </viewstaff:%d>.
premium.success_after_check: Premium is now active in this server!
premium.no_subscription: Could not find an active Patreon subscription linked to your Discord account. Ensure that you [have linked your Patreon and Discord accounts](https://support.patreon.com/hc/en-us/articles/212052266-Get-my-Discord-role), and a further waited 10 minutes.
premium.open_form_description: Press the button below to reopen the form
premium.already_purchased_description: If you have already purchased premium, select the payment method from the dropdown to get started

selector.description: Select which method you used to obtain premium

key.description: Select this option if you were given a giveaway key

patreon.description: Select this option if you made your purchase on Patreon

discord.description: Select this option if you made your purchase within the Discord in-app store

premium.about: Premium gives you access to more panels, statistics, a custom bot and more! Visit our [website](https://tickets.bot/premium) to find out more.
premium.already_activated: Good news! Premium is already active in this server.
premium.already_activated_whitelabel:
Good news! Premium is already active in this server.

For help getting started with whitelabel, read [our whitelabel setup guide](https://docs.tickets.bot/premium/whitelabel-setup-guide).

discord.no_subscription:
Premium can be purchased within Discord directly. Click the button below this message to open the subscription management page.

One purchased, please allow up to 5 minutes for the subscription to be detected.

premium.subscription_found_content_modern: Your Patreon subscription has been found. Please click on the "Open Server Selector" button below in order to open the dashboard to select which servers you wish to apply your premium subscription to.

notes.added_to_existing: You have been added to the existing notes thread: <#%d>
notes.created: A notes thread has been created for this ticket: <#%d>
notes.channel_mode_only: Note threads are only supported in channel mode

rename.ratelimited: Due to limitations imposed by Discord, tickets can only be renamed twice every 10 minutes

vote.no_credits: Redemption failed: you do not have any vote credits!

success.plural: Your vote credits have been redeemed for **%d** days of premium!
success.singular: Your vote credits have been redeemed for **%d** day of premium!

with_credits.plural: You have **%d** vote credits. Click the "Redeem Credits" button below to redeem them for %d days of premium in this server.
with_credits.singular: You have **%d** vote credit. Click the "Redeem Credits" button below to redeem them for %d day of premium in this server.

support.users_warning: -# **Warning:** Users in support teams are now deprecated. Please migrate to roles.

description.read_messages: Allows the bot to view the content of a channel.
description.send_messages: Allows the bot to send messages in channels.
description.embed_links: Allows the bot to send ticket panels, welcome messages, and tags that include an embedded message.
description.attach_files: Allows the bot to assign the attach files permission to the ticket opener.
description.add_reactions: Allows the bot to add the buttons to ticket panels, welcome messages, and all commands that use buttons.
description.use_external_emojis: Allows the bot to use non-server emojis in ticket panels, welcome messages, and tags. Bot must still be in the other server to use them.
description.mention_everyone: Allows the bot to mention everyone, here and all roles in a ticket.
description.read_message_history: Allows the bot to read all messages in a channel.
description.manage_channels: Allows the bot to create, rename, recategorize, and delete channels.
description.manage_roles: Allows the bot to create and edit roles; give and take away roles from users; and adjust a channel's role permissions.
description.manage_webhooks: Allows the bot to create webhooks for transcripts, and for staff to use the dashboard to send messages or tags in open tickets.
description.manage_threads: Allows the bot to create, rename, close, and delete threads.
description.send_messages_in_threads: Allows the bot to send messages in threads.
description.create_public_threads: Allows the bot to create public threads.
description.create_private_threads: Allows the bot to create private threads, such as thread mode tickets and the /notes command for channel tickets.
description.use_application_commands: Allows the bot's slash commands to work.
